# Assembly compiler for Coursera Course Nand2tetris

## Compile

```shell
clang++ -std=c++17 ./src -o asm-compiler.exe
```

## Run

Provide the program with the .asm file to  be compiled:

```shell
./asm-compiler.exe <asm-file>
```

Then you will get a .hack file in the same directory with the content like this:

```assembly
0000000000000000
1111110000010000
0000000000010111
1110001100000110
0000000000010000
1110001100001000
0100000000000000
1110110000010000
0000000000010001
1110001100001000
0000000000010001
1111110000100000
1110111010001000
0000000000010001
1111110000010000
0000000000100000
1110000010010000
0000000000010001
1110001100001000
0000000000010000
1111110010011000
0000000000001010
1110001100000001
0000000000010111
1110101010000111
```
